entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Moncton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:20 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -4.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Greater Moncton Rom√©o LeBlanc Int'l Airport 07:00 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -4.0°C

Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 91 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -5.2°C
Wind: E 29 km/h gust 40 km/h

entry.title: Thursday: Rain or snow. High 9.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to rain this morning. Risk of freezing rain this morning. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Rainfall amount 15 mm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southeast 50 gusting to 80 late this morning. High 9. Wind chill minus 15 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain showers or flurries. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Rain showers changing to a few flurries late this evening and ending after midnight then partly cloudy. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 13 except minus 18 in low lying areas.
